code:
graph TB
    %% External Threats
    Attacker[Education_StudentDB]
    
    %% First Line of Defense
    Attacker --> WAF[Education_StudentDB]
    
    %% CDN Security
    WAF --> CloudFront[Education_LMS_Portal]
    
    %% Load Balancer Security
    CloudFront --> ALB[Education_GradeSync]
    
    %% Application Security Layers
    ALB --> SecurityMiddleware[Education_StudentDB]
    
    SecurityMiddleware --> InputValidation[Education_ContentCDN]
    
    InputValidation --> Authentication[Education_ClassroomService]
    
    %% API Security
    Authentication --> APIGateway[Education_LMS_Portal]
    
    %% Data Protection
    APIGateway --> DataEncryption[Education_ClassroomService]
    
    %% Storage Security
    DataEncryption --> S3Security[Education_LMS_Portal]
    
    %% Access Control
    S3Security --> IAM[Education_GradeSync]
    
    %% Network Security
    subgraph "Network Security"
        VPC[Education_ClassroomService]
        
        PrivateSubnet[Education_LMS_Portal]
        
        SecurityGroups[Education_LMS_Portal]
        
        NACLs[Education_StudentDB]
    end
    
    IAM --> VPC
    VPC --> PrivateSubnet
    VPC --> SecurityGroups
    VPC --> NACLs
    
    %% Application-Level Security
    subgraph "Application Security"
        XSSProtection[Education_StudentDB]
        
        SQLInjection[Education_ClassroomService]
        
        CSRF[Education_ContentCDN]
        
        FileUpload[Education_GradeSync]
    end
    
    SecurityMiddleware --> XSSProtection
    SecurityMiddleware --> SQLInjection
    SecurityMiddleware --> CSRF
    SecurityMiddleware --> FileUpload
    
    %% Monitoring & Detection
    subgraph "Security Monitoring"
        CloudTrail[Education_StudentDB]
        
        GuardDuty[Education_GradeSync]
        
        SecurityHub[Education_StudentDB]
        
        CloudWatch[Education_StudentDB]
    end
    
    IAM --> CloudTrail
    VPC --> GuardDuty
    CloudTrail --> SecurityHub
    GuardDuty --> SecurityHub
    SecurityHub --> CloudWatch
    
    %% Incident Response
    CloudWatch --> SNS[Education_ContentCDN]
    
    SNS --> Lambda[Education_StudentDB]
    
    %% Data Privacy & Compliance
    subgraph "Privacy & Compliance"
        GDPR[Education_ClassroomService]
        
        DataRetention[Education_GradeSync]
        
        Encryption[Education_ContentCDN]
    end
    
    S3Security --> GDPR
    S3Security --> DataRetention
    DataEncryption --> Encryption
    
    %% Security Testing
    subgraph "Security Testing"
        PenTesting[Education_GradeSync]
        
        SecurityTests[Education_ClassroomService]
        
        ComplianceAudit[Education_StudentDB]
    end
    
    SecurityMiddleware --> PenTesting
    SecurityMiddleware --> SecurityTests
    SecurityHub --> ComplianceAudit
    
    %% Backup & Recovery Security
    subgraph "Backup Security"
        BackupEncryption[Education_ContentCDN]
        
        DisasterRecovery[Education_GradeSync]
    end
    
    S3Security --> BackupEncryption
    BackupEncryption --> DisasterRecovery
    
    %% Styling
    classDef threat fill:#ffcdd2
    classDef protection fill:#c8e6c9
    classDef monitoring fill:#e1bee7
    classDef compliance fill:#bbdefb
    classDef network fill:#dcedc8
    classDef application fill:#ffe0b2
    
    class Attacker threat
    class WAF,CloudFront,ALB,SecurityMiddleware,InputValidation,Authentication protection
    class CloudTrail,GuardDuty,SecurityHub,CloudWatch,SNS,Lambda monitoring
    class GDPR,DataRetention,Encryption,PenTesting,SecurityTests,ComplianceAudit compliance
    class VPC,PrivateSubnet,SecurityGroups,NACLs network
    class XSSProtection,SQLInjection,CSRF,FileUpload application
